titles.title: High Rise Fire Sprinkler Incentive Act of 2024
High Rise Fire Sprinkler Incentive Act of 2024
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to classify certain automatic fire sprinkler system retrofits as 15-year property for purposes of depreciation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
High Rise Fire Sprinkler Incentive Act of 2024
This bill classifies any automatic fire sprinkler system retrofit property as 15-year property for purposes of accelerated depreciation.
